roleset.name: get
roleset.note: OBTAIN-V NOTES: This really does occur. (from obtain.01-v)

example.name: get
example.text: The thrift holding company said it-1 expects *trace*-1 to obtain regulatory approval by year-end.

example.name: ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: But the U.S. State Department still included this list obtained from an Internet search in the UN Security Council draft resolution submitted by France , Germany , and Britain .
